Package biblinkcreator

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataDownloader
    A mechanism that downloads data by utilizing APIs from various bibliographic sources and saves them into semantic repositories.
    DataExtractor
    A mechanism that extracts preprocesses and saves bibliographic data retrieved from semantic repositories.
    DataLinker
    A mechanism that links bibliographic data retrieved from semantic repositories.
    DataStructure
    A class containing the static classes of the project.
    DataStructure.APIDownloadParameterData
    A static class which can be used to provide the download parameters of APIs.
    DataStructure.AuthenticationData
    A static class which can be used to provide the authentication data of a repository connection.
    DataStructure.CategoryAToleranceData
    A static class which can be used to provide the string similarity thresholds of titles and the maximum absolute difference of the years, for the category-A identified data.
    DataStructure.CategoryBToleranceData
    A static class which can be used to provide the string similarity threshold for the category-B identified data.
    DataStructure.DownloadParameterData
    A static class which can be used to provide the general download parameters of APIs.
    DataStructure.ExtractedData
    A static class which can be used for extracted data from a repository.
    DataStructure.ExtractionResult
    A static class which can be used for a repository extraction result.
    DataStructure.IdentifierChainData
    A static class which can be used for the identifier chain data of the download APIs.
    DataStructure.LinkData
    A static class which can be used for created links.
    DataStructure.PubMedDownloadParameterData
    A static class which can be used to provide the download parameters of PubMed API.
    DataStructure.RepositoryInfo
    A static class which can be used to provide parameters for a repository connection.
    DataStructure.StringFormatData
    A static class which can be used to provide the user-defined string replacement lists for the identifiers, titles and years.
    DataStructure.StringFormatResult
    A static class which can be used for the result of a string formatting.
    DataStructure.StringReplacementData
    A static class which can be used to for the user-defined string replacements.
    DataStructure.StringSimilaritySelector
    A static class which can be used to select a string similarity measure and provide its parameters.
    DataStructure.ToleranceData
    A static class which can be used to provide the string similarity thresholds of titles and the maximum absolute difference of the years.
    DataStructure.WorldCatCallable
    A static class which can be used for parallel downloads from WorldCat.
    DataStructure.WorldCatDownloadParameterData
    A static class which can be used to provide the download parameters of WorldCat API.
    FileOperation
    A class providing basic file operations.
    Identifier
    A class for the identifiers involved in the link creation.
    Logger
    A message logging mechanism.
    Quadstore
    A class for the quadstore methods.
    Schema
    A class for the structure (vocabulary) of the saved data or links.
    StringOperation
    A class providing basic string operations for the identifier, title and year.
    StringSimilarity
    A class for the string similarity measures.
    UIDFunctionStore
    A class for unique identifier conversion and validation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DataDownloader.SourceType
    An enumeration for the download APIs.
    Identifier.CategoryAIdentifierType
    An enumeration for the category-A identifiers.
    Identifier.CategoryBIdentifierType
    An enumeration for the category-B identifiers.
    Identifier.IdentifierType
    An enumeration for all the identifiers.
    Logger.MessageCategory
    An enumeration for the category of the printed messages.
    Logger.PrintType
    An enumeration for the destination of the printed messages.
    StringOperation.StringReplacementType
    An enumeration for the type of string replacement.
    StringSimilarity.ShingleType
    An enumeration for string segmentation types.
    StringSimilarity.SimilarityType
    An enumeration for the string similarity measures.
